com.gej.object

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gej.object.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    A tile is a type of object which just sit's there and doesn't do anything. Often used to decorate maps or for fake wall's etc., Note that they cannot be destroyed while the map is running and they are not animated too.
    Author:
    Sri Harsha Chilakapati

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tile(java.awt.Image img, int x, int y)
      Constructs a new tile with an image at a specified position
